title: ICE when using rls (vscode)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-dev-tools
labels.description: Relevant to the dev-tools subteam, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.
